title: BRIEF-Safran Wins $37 Mln Contract from Lockheed Martin Australia
text:
BRIEF-Safran Wins $37 Mln Contract from Lockheed Martin Australia

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 09, 2019 00:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Safran Wins $37 Mln Contract from Lockheed Martin Australia Oct 8 (Reuters) - Safran : * LOCKHEED MARTIN AUSTRALIA AWARDS $37 MILLION CONTRACT TO SAFRAN TO PROVIDE KEY SYSTEMS DESIGN FOR AUSTRALIA'S FUTURE SUBMARINES * SAFRAN WILL SUBCONTRACT TWO AUSTRALIAN COMPANIES, ACACIA SYSTEMS AND THOMAS GLOBAL SYSTEMS * CONTRACT, WHICH WILL BE IN FORCE UNTIL MAY 2023, WILL SEE SAFRAN DELIVER PRELIMINARY AND DETAILED DESIGNS FOR COMBAT SYSTEM'S OPTRONICS SEARCH AND ATTACK MAST, NAVIGATION RADAR AND NAVIGATION DATA DISTRIBUTION COMPONENTS

BRIEF-Safran Wins $37 Mln Contract from Lockheed Martin Australia
description: BRIEF-Safran Wins $37 Mln Contract from Lockheed Martin Australia
